ctx: intros a b c nZc p q r Cannon_p Cannon_q Cannon_r Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b c nZc p q r Cannon_p Cannon_q Cannon_r Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (IHr (divP_minusTerm_comp a b c Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm)).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term A n nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c p, q : list (Term A n) a0 : Term A n r : list (Term A n) Cannon_p : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Cannon_q : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Cannon_r : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a0 :: r) Div_a_c : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a c Div_b_c : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n b c Eq_a_b : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b Not_zero_minusTerm : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) IHr : canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (spminusf (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) c nZc (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) r) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spminusf a c nZc p r) (spminusf b c nZc q r)) The term "divP_minusTerm_comp a b c Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm" has type "divP A A0 eqA multA divA n (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) c" while it is expected to have type "canonical A0 eqA ltM r".

ctx: intros a b c nZc p q r Cannon_p Cannon_q Cannon_r Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm.
exceptions.tactic: apply spminusf_minuspf with (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r) in x; auto.

original: intros a b c nZc p q r Cannon_p Cannon_q Cannon_r Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm. induction r. - apply minuspf_inv3b with (p:=p) (q:=q) in x; auto. - rewrite <- (IHr (divP_minusTerm_comp a b c Div_a_c Div_b_c Eq_a_b Not_zero_minusTerm)). apply spminusf_minuspf with (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r) in x; auto.
